plugins.name: project-planning
plugins.description: Engineering and construction project planning with toll gate process. Scope analysis, three-alternative comparison, FEED, AACE cost estimates, CPM scheduling, procurement strategy, constructability, value engineering, risk management, and permits through Design Freeze.

plugins.name: quantum-computing
plugins.description: Explain quantum computing concepts through structured pedagogical workflows with LaTeX rendering. 15 skills covering quantum mechanics, algebra, algorithms, entanglement, teleportation, density matrices, QFT, experiments, hardware, and history.
